Content: In the Implementation/Deployment Phase, the Bike Ta Bai system becomes fully active for renters, bike owners, and administrators. Renters browse and book bicycles directly through the web application on their devices, while owners manage bike listings, approve rental requests, and monitor active rentals through the owner dashboard. Administrators manage and monitor the entire platform from the admin dashboard, including user verification, system oversight, and analytics. All users receive real-time notifications for booking confirmations, payment alerts, and geofence violations, keeping everyone informed quickly and clearly. The system operates seamlessly across desktop and mobile browsers, ensuring accessibility for all users regardless of their device.

The User Guide provides clear instructions for renters, bike owners, and administrators to use the Bike Ta Bai system effectively. It explains how renters can browse available bikes, create bookings, and manage their rentals through the web application. For owners, it details how to list bikes, manage rental requests, track earnings, and monitor renter locations during active rentals. For administrators, it covers user management, owner verification, system monitoring, and reporting features. The guide ensures all user roles can fully utilize the system's features to facilitate eco-friendly bike rentals in Cebu City.

1. Open the Bike Ta Bai web application in a browser (Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, or Safari). 2. Click the "Login" button or navigate to the login page. 3. Enter your email address and password, then click "Sign in". 4. After successful login, you will be redirected to your renter dashboard.
1. Click on your profile icon or name in the top navigation bar. 2. Select "Logout" from the dropdown menu. 3. You will be securely logged out and redirected to the home page.

1. Open the Bike Ta Bai web application in a browser on your device. 2. Click the "Login" button or navigate to the login page. 3. Enter your email address and password, then click "Sign in". 4. After successful login, you will be redirected to your owner dashboard.
1. Click on your profile icon or name in the top navigation bar. 2. Select "Logout" from the dropdown menu. 3. You will be securely logged out and redirected to the home page.

1. Open the Bike Ta Bai web application in a browser. 2. Navigate to the login page. 3. Enter your admin email address and password, then click "Sign in". 4. After successful login, you will be automatically redirected to the admin dashboard.
1. Go to the navigation menu in the admin dashboard. 2. Click the "Logout" button or select "Logout" from the profile menu. 3. You will be securely logged out and redirected to the home page.
